title: The good, the bad, the ugly: Does the 2024 Tour de France Femmes hit the mark?
content:
Next year's Tour de France Femmes will feature the race's first foreign stages and sends the peloton up the Alpe d'Huez for a historic finale.

Read the full article at The good, the bad, the ugly: Does the 2024 Tour de France Femmes hit the mark? on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
